text: Ane ame madayanana loko tarapha temana bha'i su'aiba (a.Sa.)Ne mokalya, temane kahyum ke he mari komana loko! Allahani bandagi karo, tena sivaya tamaro ko'i pujya nathi ane tame tolamapamam pana kami na karo, hum to tamane khusa jo'i rahyo chum ane mane tamara para gheri lenara prakopano bhaya che
